localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Focus on one important task today. You decide what to focus on. After you set today's task you can't change or delete it. Keep a streak of days you finished your daily task.
blogPost.body: Focus on one important task today. You decide what to focus on. After you set today's task you can't change or delete it. Keep a streak of days you finished your daily task.
blogPost.title: TinyDo - One task today
blogPost.author: Igor Dyachuk

localize.description: 今天专注于一项重要任务。你决定专注于什么。当你设定了今天的任务后，你就不能更改或删除它。保持你完成每日任务的天数的连贯性。
今天專注於一項重要任務。你決定專注於什麼。當你設定了今天的任務後，你就不能更改或刪除它。保持你完成每日任務的天數的連貫性。

previous.excerpt: Night Eye WP dark mode plugin is a powerful software that uses advanced algorithm to enable dark mode on your WordPress website. Night Eye uses smart color conversion, is highly customizable and extremely easy to use.
previous.title: WordPress Dark Mode Plugin - Add smooth dark mode on your WordPress website

localize.description: 夜眼WP黑暗模式插件是一款功能强大的软件，它采用先进的算法，可以让您的WordPress网站启用黑暗模式。夜眼使用智能颜色转换，高度可定制，使用起来极为方便。
localize.tagline: 在您的WordPress网站上添加平滑的黑暗模式

localize.description: 夜眼WP黑暗模式插件是一款功能強大的軟件，它採用先進的算法，可以讓您的WordPress網站啓用黑暗模式。夜眼使用智能顏色轉換，高度可定製，使用起來極爲方便。
localize.tagline: 在您的WordPress網站上添加平滑的黑暗模式

next.excerpt: Slack Connect allows you to send direct messages to people outside your company, simplifying the way you work with partners. Use this feature to seamlessly schedule meetings, sign documents and quickly collaborate on important tasks without ever leaving Slack.
next.title: Slack Connect Direct Messages - DM anyone outside your company from Slack

localize.description: Slack Connect 允许您直接向公司以外的人员发送消息，简化了您与合作伙伴的合作方式。使用此功能可无缝安排会议、签署文件并快速协作完成重要任务，而无需离开Slack。
localize.tagline: 通过Slack向公司以外的人发送DM

localize.description: Slack Connect 允許您直接向公司以外的人員發送消息，簡化了您與合作伙伴的合作方式。使用此功能可無縫安排會議、簽署文件並快速協作完成重要任務，而無需離開Slack。
localize.tagline: 通過Slack向公司以外的人發送DM
